scripts.dev: tsc -p packages/main && tsc -p packages/preload && concurrently -k "tsc -w -p packages/main" "tsc -w -p packages/preload" "vite --config packages/renderer/vite.config.ts" "electron ."
scripts.build: vite build --config packages/renderer/vite.config.ts && tsc -p packages/main && tsc -p packages/preload && electron-builder --dir
scripts.dist:zip: vite build --config packages/renderer/vite.config.ts && tsc -p packages/main && tsc -p packages/preload && electron-builder -w zip
